title: 跨服的配置文件
author: 刘备520
txt_content:
如何把服务器的ip添加到跨服文件里 ，顺便教教~
配置文件列表：- say
player_limit: -1
stats: 683a9b82-a2f7-4606-9638-e664ac1b1f46
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
listeners:
- max_players: 1
  fallback_server: 登陆
  host: 0.0.0.0:25565
  bind_local_address: true
  ping_passthrough: false
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  default_server: 登陆
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: ture
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  query_enabled: false
  query_port: 25577
timeout: 30000
connection_throttle: 4000
servers:
  空岛:
    address: localhost:25565
    restricted: false
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
  生存:
    address: localhost:25565
    restricted: false
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
ip_forward: ture
online_mode: false
